title: Go project scaffolding
description:
Initialize Go module and CLI framework.

- go mod init github.com/pengelbrecht/ticker
- Add cobra for CLI
- Create cmd/ticker/main.go with basic structure
- Add internal/ directory structure per SPEC.md
- Verify: go build ./... succeeds
closed_reason: Go project scaffolding complete: cmd/ticker/main.go with cobra, internal/ packages
